info.title: FTA Tariff Rates API
info.description: The FTA Tariff Rates API provides data about each country with whom the United States has a Free Trade Agreement (FTA). When the U.S. enters into an FTA with a foreign government, it negotiates lower tariff rates with that government for a wide variety of products. A tariff is a tax that a company must pay a foreign country when shipping a product to that country. Typically the FTA tariffs rates decline over several years.

get.description: The FTA Tariff Rates API provides data about each country with whom the United States has a Free Trade Agreement (FTA). When the U.S. enters into an FTA with a foreign government, it negotiates lower tariff rates with that government for a wide variety of products. A tariff is a tax that a company must pay a foreign country when shipping a product to that country. Typically the FTA tariffs rates decline over several years.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Searches for a match within the subheading_description, tariff_rate_quota_note, rule_text, and tariff_line fields.

parameters.name: sources
parameters.description: Returns tariff rates based on the ISO alpha-2 country codes of the source country. This method allows you to search for multiple sources (plural) separated by commas.

parameters.name: final_years
parameters.description: Returns entries based on the final_year field. Years are specified as a comma-delimited list.

parameters.name: partner_start_years
parameters.description: Returns entries based on the partner_start_year field. Years are specified as a comma-delimited list.

parameters.name: reporter_start_years
parameters.description: Returns entries based on the reporter_start_year field. Years are specified as a comma-delimited list.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size parameter allows you to configure the number of results to be returned up to a maximum of 100.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset parameter defines the offset from the first result you want to fetch. Unless specified the API returns 10 results at a time.

source.description: Two letter code for the “reporter” country with whom the U.S. has the Free Trade Agreement.

tariff_line.description: Product's Harmonized System (HS) code for the product according to the reporter's nomenclature.

subheading_description.description: English description at the subheading level (6-digit HS code).

base_rate.description: The numeric tariff rate from which tariff reductions are calculated. Typically, this is the applied tariff rate at the time the FTA was negotiated.

base_rate_alt.description: The non-numeric (specific) tariff rate from which the tariff reductions are calculated. Typically, this is the applied tariff rate at the time the FTA was negotiated.

final_year.description: The year the tariff is eliminated under the FTA.

tariff_rate_quota.description: Flag noting tariff treatment for products within quota (2) and out of quota (1).

tariff_rate_quota_note.description: Text note about the tariff-rate quota (TRQ) applicable to the product.

tariff_eliminated.description: Flag noting whether or not the tariff is eventually eliminated. “False”= not eliminated.

staging_basket.description: The agreed tariff phase-out period for the product under the FTA.

partner_start_year.description: Year the agreement entered into force for the partner. (The first year of tariff cuts).

reporter_start_year.description: Year the agreement entered into force for the reporter. (The first year of tariff cuts).

partner_agreement_name.description: Agreement name for the partner country.

reporter_agreement_name.description: Agreement name for the reporter country.

quota_name.description: Description for products subject to tariff-rate quotas. (Describes in-quota and out-of-quota tariff lines).

rule_text.description: Text describing the applicable rule of origin for the product.

link_text.description: Text describing URL to more detailed rule of origin information.

link_url.description: URL to more detailed rule of origin information.

annual_rates.description: Numeric year-by-year tariff rates under the FTA as the tariff is eliminated.

annual_rates_alt.description: Non-numeric (specific) year-by-year tariff rates under the FTA.
